price: 58. Kaadu nabiyow makki koros ni-yallittey nanu naqbude tayse innaa, hinnak Qiisay le-mari yaqbude yayseeh itte? Amá ceelallo giddik sa koh kah yoogoreenim malón nabiyow, wonna hinnay usun deedalal sinam giddiyaah keemaarisa mara kinnon.
arabic: وَقَالُوٓاْ ءَأَٰلِهَتُنَا خَيۡرٌ أَمۡ هُوَۚ مَا ضَرَبُوهُ لَكَ إِلَّا جَدَلَۢاۚ بَلۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٌ خَصِمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waqālū aālihatunā khayrun am huwa mā ḍarabūhu laka illā jadalan bal hum qawmun khaṣimūna
